3: Lee!
Urgh...
I'm alright. I was just a little careless.
Rosetta?
Chief... You...
I thought I told you not to come.
How could we stay behind with everything going on out here?
You don't have to explain anything...
We understand.
We've always been the scapegoats. Everyone's just used to it.
However we are rejected, we've accepted it as our fate no matter how resentful we may be.
You're the only one to never back down... Maybe this is why everyone looks up to you so much, Rosetta.
It's been an honor to have you as my mentor.
Diana...
I just didn't expect this day to come so soon...
Why would you... want to... fight for those humans...?
Isn't that obvious?
Obvious...
Forest Guards, spread out! Protect New Murmansk!
Liv... help the Forest Guards...
But you...
I'll be okay. Someone of your capability is better off helping them in battle.
Go save the others. I'll take care of Rosetta.
